articles.title: Former Trump White House lawyer reacts to FBI's Mar-a-Lago search - CNN Video
articles.description: Former Trump White House lawyer Ty Cobb joins CNN's Erin Burnett to discuss the FBI's search of former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago residence in Palm Beach, Florida.

articles.title: Video: Hear what Trump supporters say about FBI raid of Mar-a-Lago - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Randi Kaye speaks with Trump supporters in Palm Beach, Florida, as they're rallying for the former president over the FBI raid of his Mar-a-Lago residence.
